Temple pain crept to ≈ 2 /10; neck tight; vertigo mild
afternoon: Quiet work; noise sensitivity lingered • right-scap menthol patch during light piano

key notes: • July Ubrelvy tally now at 2 doses (2 Jul & 3 Jul) • Sublingual CBD plus caffeine/Excedrin likely drove lingering vertigo and sedation • Pillow over-adjustment in evening triggered nausea/vomiting; softer pillow kept, no further testing until vestibular calm
noon status (12:30): Pain gone; vertigo minimal; took 2 drops sublingual CBD → felt sedated/heavy
evening: 18:30 bread-bowl chicken-noodle soup • Mg 135 mg + fish-oil #3 • lights out 20:40
night: Slept ≈ 21:00 → woke 04:00 on 4 Jul; mild residual vertigo
